The parties shall appear for initial case management conferences on August 1, 2025..." The injunction may be a preliminary injunction; typically lasts until final judgment or until the court imposes a final order. It's not a fixed duration. So we could mark "Not Applicable" as representing that there is no fixed duration. But we also have the Ex Parte TRO which has 14 days.
